attributes.description:
+ Optional 12 Month Warranty Available.

+ Vehicle is in a immaculate condition, come and view this vehicle.

+ We Deliver Nationwide, we are based just 40 min from Johannesburg.

+ Finance can be arranged.

+ Trade-Ins Welcome.

Why you must buy from Koos & Mike Used Cars:

1. Our Prices includes on the road cost.(CASH BUYS)

2. All our cars comes with a roadworthy certificate.

3. All cars will be delivered with a oil service before delivery.

4. Paperwork is our priority and not your responsibility.

5. Finance approvals is our goal.

6. You are our customer our advertisement and our reference for tomorrow.

7. The first 5 services on the car will be half price.

8. Warranty option available on all our cars (not included in selling price, can be taken out additionally)

9. We buy decent cars for cash.

10. All our cars have cartrack pre-installed. (Ts & Cs apply)

11. You get 1 free Valet for your vehicle before delivery

12. We offer an optional warranty package on all our vehicles with an R 7990 - R 19 000 installment

13. Ts & Cs APPLY

Please contact us for vehicle availability before you waste time and money on transport (our stock sells fast)

attributes.description:
If you have been on the lookout for a great new vehicle to propel your South African SME or entrepreneurial business to a whole new level, we’ve got excellent news. May we please present, the all-new Renault Triber Express Panel Van! Following in the slipstream of the very popular multi-modal, 7-seater Renault Triber, this new addition to the Renault line-up has been tailormade for the needs of the savvy business owner.

If you want to enjoy a great return on investment when you purchase a new business vehicle:, you should seriously consider the new Renault Triber Express Pane1 Van

attributes.description: Action Ford Modimolle is a proud member of CFAO Motors South Africa. Our network re-present us across the country with the opportunity to leave our footprint in various brands. We pride ourselves to the top level of quality service that is well known within Ford SA's extremely high standards in our range of New and Approved Pre - Owned vehicles. Our well trained Team of Sales Executive's eagerly await your request to assist and find the right vehicle to fit your personal needs, with our expert onsite Business Manager that will structure the best possible deal to suit your financial needs. Our top notch Technical Team and Parts department will cater for your every need and assist with friendly service in our ongoing effort to treat you, our best asset, with care and professionalism, to ensure our service levels meet with your high demand! We think this to be a good time for you to contact us!
